info.description: API for user authentication, job management, and truck management in MoveShare application
info.title: MoveShare API

get.description: Fetches company data for the current user

patch.description: Partially updates company data for the current user

get.description: Fetches all applications submitted by the current user
Fetches jobs not created by the current user with optional filters and pagination
Fetches all jobs created by the current user

delete.description: Deletes a job created by the current user

post.description: Allows a user to apply for a job
Authenticates a user and returns user details with access and refresh tokens

get.description: Fetches all trucks owned by the current user

post.description: Creates a new truck with optional photo uploads

get.description: Fetches a specific truck by ID owned by the current user

put.description: Updates an existing truck owned by the current user

delete.description: Deletes a truck owned by the current user
